author: Staff Reporter
text:
Aruldasan (41) of Melamaiyur, an AIADMK functionary, reportedly sustained injuries after a gang that is yet to be identified hurled country bombs at the Tiruporur Road junction in Vallam near Chengalpattu, on Thursday.

According to police sources, the incident took place around 7 p.m. when Aruldasan and a few others were standing near a bakery at the junction.

The gang members came in a car and hurled two bombs at Aruldasan.

He sustained injuries on his left hand and leg.

Two other persons, Dinesh and Vijayaraghavan, who were standing near Aruldasan, were also injured, police sources said.

The three men were rushed to the Chengalpattu Medical College Hospital.

The Chengalpattu Taluk Police have registered a case and are on the lookout for the culprits.
title: AIADMK functionary injured in bomb attack
